attributes.additional_details:
To reduce, by at least one, the number of Bank Holidays we have each year.
We did not need the extra Bank Holiday granted by Prime Minister Blair before 1997 so we can surely survive without it now.
This move will help to make UK PLC more competitive and help us all to get out of the economic mess we are in.
It is fair as it will affect all parts of society equally - including politicians.
